tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fermentation_data (
  batch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  temperature FLOAT,
  pH FLOAT,
  pressure FLOAT,
  duration INT
)
CREATE TABLE FermentationData (   id INT PRIMARY KEY,   temperature FLOAT,   pH FLOAT,   time DATETIME,   status VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE YieldData (   id INT PRIMARY KEY,   batch_id INT,   yield FLOAT,   efficiency FLOAT,   date DATE );

CREATE TABLE fermentation_process_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    temperature FLOAT,
    pH FLOAT,
    time TIMESTAMP,
    pressure FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE fermentation_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    pH FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE FermentationProcess (
  fermentation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP,
  temperature FLOAT,
  ph_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE YeastStrains (
  strain_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strain_name VARCHAR(255),
  supplier VARCHAR(255),
  fermentation_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (fermentation_id) REFERENCES FermentationProcess(fermentation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FermentationLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  fermentation_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  log_message TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (fermentation_id) REFERENCES FermentationProcess(fermentation_id)
);
